short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Opens your favorite daily puzzles with a click or on a new day

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension allows you to create and manage a list of your favorite online puzzles and games. The extension will automatically open all your enabled puzzles in new tabs on a new day, saving you the hassle of manually opening each one.
